channel.title: Analysis on Promotion of Research data management, an open source Project.
channel.description: Recent content in Analysis on Promotion of Research data management, an open source Project.

item.title: What we discovered so far
item.description: Method Here, we use the text collected and analysed so far (mostly via browsing the web, few direct contribution from the crowd), comparing it to a report from the research data alliance report. Both reports can be found as blog posts found under the category analysis. Summary We focused our analysis on three interesting content: Marketing strategies (how to reach researchers), arguments for research data management, and stories to tell.

item.title: Analysing the data
item.description: On this page, we will report the analysis of the data we gathered and collected, the page is recreated with updated data. The data itsel is created in a spreadsheet available on the github page. We welcome any of your comments in the blog comment section below. For each argument, we gathered real life stories punch lines jokes, funny way to bring it reference to the (pop) culture wich could be used list of arguments: Open data is inevitable
